item.title: LBC 360 provides comprehensive business services in the Philippines
item.description:
Source: LBC YouTube channel. In November 2014, LBC Express, the top cargo and logistics company in the Philippines, introduced a unique, fully integrated payment and logistics solution for the country. This platform, called LBC 360, aims to assist Filipino businesses of all types and sizes in overcoming supply chain obstacles. “LBC 360 is intentionally crafted to be advantageous for all business models, from physical stores to online marketplaces,” explained Miguel Camahort, LBC President and Chief Operating Officer...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/lbc-360-provides-comprehensive-business-services-in-the-philippines/
